owners.name: Devon Zeek
owners.title: CoFounder & Lead Designer
owners.description: With over 15 years of experience in landscape architecture, John brings a passion for creating beautiful and sustainable outdoor spaces.

owners.name: Sophia Kawada
owners.title: Co-Founder & Operations Manager
owners.description: Jane ensures that every project runs smoothly from start to finish, with a focus on quality and client satisfaction.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2008, Landscape Vision was born out of a shared passion for nature and design. We believe that a well-designed landscape can transform a property, creating a sanctuary for relaxation and enjoyment. Our team is dedicated to bringing your vision to life, with a commitment to quality, creativity, and sustainability.

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We start by listening to your ideas and understanding your needs. This initial consultation helps us to develop a clear vision for your project.

steps.title: Design
steps.description: Our team creates a detailed design plan, including plant selections, material choices, and layout. We work with you to refine the design until it's perfect.

steps.title: Installation
steps.description: Our experienced crew brings the design to life, with a focus on quality craftsmanship and attention to detail.

steps.title: Maintenance
steps.description: We offer ongoing maintenance services to ensure that your landscape remains beautiful and healthy for years to come.
